description.en:
A rock star famous around the world suddenly disappears, leaving a string of dead bodies connected to him... then, an amateur detective named Rosie takes on the task of finding the elusive man. What horrible secret is he about to uncover?
(From Manga Reborn)

------------------------
Part of the Comic Roman Mystery Collection
Choice of works by different authors

Volumes in series:
1: Kokui no Ever
2: Mizu no Naka no Akai Ie
